author: fielding
msg: Argh!  This doesn't work, but it is such a good idea (IMNSHO) that I want
to get Jon to make it work. ;-)  The idea is to manipulate the XML tree
directly in order to set default attributes, rather than try to output
scraps of the element with a fixed set of attributes.
It might help to update the versions of Velocity and JDOM in lib.

author: fielding
msg: Trim the fat.  Eliminate the most annoying places where macros are adding
whitespace to the output.  Don't color the copyright statement like a link.

author: fielding
msg: I've been playing in this sandbox too long -- time to commit a first
pass at the top-level site.  It still needs a lot of work.
